content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 2 ** join my fb group to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns join here 1 the lobelia nesting basket is a practical project with a beautiful handmade look to add to your home decor the basket is worked in the round with 2 strands held together you can find a note in the pattern with instructions on how to change the basket s size the basket s body has a beautiful and unique texture thanks to a combination of stitches stitches used in this pattern chain single_crochet spike single_crochet > this basket is part of the lobelia > basket set you can find the plant > holder basket ** here 3 ** > > **add both baskets to your cart and get them for only $6 5 ** - skill level - intermediate - the pattern is written using english u s terminology - hooks size needed 5 0 mm / h & 6 0 mm / j - the basket is crocheted worsted #4 weight yarn - i used knit picks - comfy worsted 4 - total amount of yarn needed - 170gr/295m/323yds **the pattern is worked with 2 strands held together** finished size 7 5 19cm diameter base 4 10cm height if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2022 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this design are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lobelia-plant-holder-basket 4 http //shrsl com/347g2
